topic.title: ZeroTalk needs some features like Reddit.
Translation for the site-loading page of ZeroNet
topic.body:
@Nofish

Im chinese, in China, when you open ZeroNet for the first time, you will always receive the "TRACKER CONNECTION ERROR DETECTED" prompt right now. And then an "Use Tor meek bridges for tracker connections" button will appear.

These prompts may confuse Chinese users who do not understand English. If you change these prompts from English to Chinese, it will bring convenience to Chinese users.

The following is the Chinese translation that I provide corresponding to these prompts.

> **TRACKER CONNECTION ERROR DETECTED** = **检测到TRACKER连接出错**

> **Use Tor meek bridges for tracker connections** = **点此使用Tor meek网桥进行Tracker连接**


In the translation of this button, I added two more words: **点此**. It means "Click here", The complete meaning is "Click here to use Tor meek bridges for tracker connections". I did this because when I first saw this button, I didn't even think it was a button but just a prompt message. Of course, you can also ignore these two words.

Also the "CONFIG" in the upper left corner of the page can also be translated into Chinese. 

> **CONFIG** = **配置**

topic.title: Translation for the site-loading page of ZeroNet

1547266872_1FwDqRAQggNDskwBo4ZLXPWC69tSa.body:
> [anonlogin](#comment_7_19r2tS5GqeMQnxmyPq9ufD79LXoMVDszDU): I think @nofish has already done enough in terms of creating example ZeroNet sites and its our task to improve upon his work.

I very much agree with you. But unfortunately I am not a programmer, I can not create these features.
